com.ragego.engine

Class GameBoard

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ragego.engine.GameBoard

  • public class GameBoard
extends Object
    Represent a board of Go. On this board, intersections are represented with numerical coordinates :
    • The first coordinate is the column from left to right.
    • The second coordinate is the line from top to bottom.

    Each intersection is assigned to a shape, empty (or assigned to something special)

    Author:
    Philippe Vienne

      • GameBoard

        public GameBoard()
        Create an real empty board. This constructor is suitable only for test purpose.

      • GameBoard

        public GameBoard(Player firstPlayer,
                 Player secondPlayer)
        Create a board with the default size.
        Parameters:
        firstPlayer - The first player (conventional white stone player)
        secondPlayer - The second player (conventional black stone player)

      • GameBoard

        public GameBoard(Player firstPlayer,
                 Player secondPlayer,
                 int boardSize)
        Create a board with a custom size.
        Parameters:
        firstPlayer - The first player (conventional white stone player)
        secondPlayer - The second player (conventional black stone player)
        boardSize - Number of column for this board
